body: Always wanted to know who is the artist that draws the cover for this magazine. Wanted to know too the artist for the COMIC LO covers.
Why is a volume of COMIC LO lacking in the loli department? Double the lolis! Triple them!!

How you get me to favorite a doujin:
1.Put Morishima Kon in it.
2.Make it the first story.
That true sendou hachi have a dark series on comic koh but is strange it inst in this month version
@Mien Yes, the artist name is Sendou Hachi. I can read Hiragana letters write on the right side of Kanji.
All these recent doujins with the tag loli and yet I see no lolis.
